allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$text = Get-Content ''00_prologue.md'' -Raw; $comme = ([regex]::Matches($text, ''\bcomme\b'')).Count; $adverbs = ([regex]::Matches($text, ''\b\w+ment\b'')).Count - ([regex]::Matches($text, ''\b(moment|testament|élément|fragment|document|ornement|sentiment|jugement|événement|mouvement)\b'')).Count; $milleAns = ([regex]::Matches($text, ''mille ans'')).Count; Write-Host ""comme: $comme""; Write-Host ""adverbes: $adverbs""; Write-Host ""mille ans: $milleAns""")
